resources.string:
Hi, my name is Raquel. 

I am an international student from Costa Rica. I am in North Central College as a part of an exchange student program. 

 Fun fact is that I love sports, I use to practice triathlon. 

 I like the food here, even if it is different from what I used to eat in my home 

 The most difficult part of this experience it's been the cold because I come from a tropical country where the temperatures are higher than here, for example my country is usually 23Â°C
